text:
Recreation and Hobbies--Bathing (Brooklyn): Local youngsters seeking relief from the hot sun by getting sprayed from a fire hydrant. The hydrant was converted into a sprayer with the use of an overturned, perforated garbage can. The view is eastward along the south side of Metropolitan Avenue from Leonard Street.
View 3 shows the girls watching the boys getting cooled off.

P. L. Sperr

View 1: Neg.#1214
View 2:
View 3:

July 23, 1937
Views 1,2,3
title: Recreation and hobbies - Bathing - Brooklyn.
